lines: pocket fm pe aap sunre hai premchand ka likha upanyas gaban mere yaani kritika ke saath
munshee deenadayaal kee jaanpahachaan ke aadamiyon mein ek mahaashay dayaanaath the bade hee sajjan aur sahraday kachaharee mein naukar the aur pachaas roopaye vetan paate the
deenadayaal adaalat ke keede the
dayaanaath ko unase saikadon hee baar kaam pad chuka tha
chaahate to hajaaron vasool karate par kabhee ek paise ke bhee ravaadaar nahin hue the
deenadayaal ke saath hee unaka yah salook na tha yah unaka svabhaav tha
yah baat bhee na thee ki vah bahut oonche aadarsh ke aadamee hon par rishvat ko haraam samajhate the
shaayad isalie ki vah apanee aankhon se is tarah ke drshy dekh chuke the
kisee ko jel jaate dekha tha kisee ko santaan se haath dhote kisee ko durvyasanon ke panje mein phansate
aisee unhen koee misaal na milatee thee jisane rishvat lekar chain kiya ho unakee yah drdh dhaarana ho gaee thee ki haraam kee kamaee haraam hee mein jaatee hai
yah baat vah kabhee na bhoolate is jamaane mein pachaas rupe kee bhugut hee kya paanch aadamiyon ka paalan badee mushkil se hota tha
ladake achchhe kapadon ko tarasate stree gahanon ko tarasatee par dayaanaath vichalit na hote the
bada ladaka do hee maheene tak kolej mein rahane ke baad padhana chhod baitha
pita ne saaph kah diya main tumhaaree digree ke lie sabako bhookha aur nanga nahin rakh sakata
padhana chaahate ho to apane purooshaarth se padho
bahuton ne kiya hai tum bhee kar sakate ho
lekin ramaanaath mein itanee lagan na thee
idhar do saal se vah bilkul bekaar tha
shataranj khelata sairsapaate karata aur maan aur chhote bhaeeyon par rob jamaata
doston kee badaulat shauk poora hota rahata tha
kisee ka chestar maang liya aur shaam ko hava khaane nikal gae
kisee ka pamp shoo pahan liya kisee kee ghadee kalaee par baandha lee
kabhee banaarasee phaishan mein nikale kabhee lakhanavee phaishan mein das mitron ne ekek kapada banava liya to das soot badalane ka upaay ho gaya
sahakaarita ka yah bilkul naya upayog tha
isee yuvak ko deenadayaal ne jaalapa ke lie pasand kiya
dayaanaath shaadee nahin karana chaahate the
unake paas na roopaye the aur na ek nae parivaar ka bhaar uthaane kee himmat par jaageshvaree ne triyahath se kaam liya aur is shakti ke saamane puroosh ko jhukana pada
jaageshvaree barason se putravadhoo ke lie tadap rahee thee
jo usake saamane bahuen banakar aaee ve aaj pote khila rahee hain phir us dukhiya ko kaise dhairy hota
vah kuchhkuchh niraash ho chalee thee
eeshvar se manaatee thee ki kaheen se baat aae
deenadayaal ne sandesh bheja to usako aankhensee mil gaee
agar kaheen yah shikaar haath se nikal gaya to phir na jaane kitane dinon aur raah dekhanee pade
koee yahaan kyon aane laga
na dhan hee hai na jaayadaad
ladake par kaun reejhata hai
log to dhan dekhate hain isalie usane is avasar par saaree shakti laga dee aur usakee vijay huee
dayaanaath ne kaha bhaee tum jaano tumhaara kaam jaane
mujhamen samaee nahin hai
jo aadamee apane pet kee phikr nahin kar sakata usaka vivaah karana mujhe to adharmsa maaloom hota hai
phir roopaye kee bhee to phikr hai
ek hajaar to teemataam ke lie chaahie jode aur gahanon ke lie alag
kaanon par haath rakhakar na baaba yah bojh mere maan ka nahin
jaageshvaree par in daleelon ka koee asar na hua boleevah bhee to kuchh dega
main usase maangane to jaoonga nahin
tumhaare maangane kee jaroorat hee na padegee
vah khud hee denge
ladakee ke byaah mein paise ka munh koee nahin dekhata
haan makadoor chaahie so deenadayaal podhe aadamee hain

aur phir yahee ek santaan hai bachaakar rakhenge to kisake lie dayaanaath ko ab koee baat na soojhee keval yahee kaha vah chaahe laakh de den chaahe ek na den main na kahoonga ki do na kahoonga ki mat do
karj main lena nahin chaahata aur loon to doonga kisake ghar se
jaageshvaree ne is baadha ko maano hava mein udaakar kaha mujhe to vishvaas hai ki vah teeke mein ek hajaar se kam na denge
tumhaare teemataam ke lie itana bahut hai
gahanon ka prabandh kisee sarraaph se kar lena
teeke mein ek hajaar denge to kya dvaar par ek hajaar bhee na denge vahee roopaye sarraaph ko de dena
dochaar sau baakee rahe vah dheeredheere chuk jaenge
bachcha ke lie koee na koee dvaar khulega hee
dayaanaath ne upekshabhaav se kaha khul chuka jise shataranj aur sairsapaate se phurasat na mile use sabhee dvaar band milenge
jaageshvaree ko apane vivaah kee baat yaad aaee
dayaanaath bhee to gulachharre udaate the lekin usake aate hee unhen chaar paise kamaane kee phikr kaisee sir par savaar ho gaee thee
saalbhar bhee na beetane paaya tha ki naukar ho gae
boleebahoo aa jaegee to usakee aankhen bhee khulengee dekh lena
apanee baat yaad karo
jab tak gale mein jua nahin pada hai tabhee tak yah kulelen hain
jua pada aur saara nasha hiran hua
nikammon ko raah par laane ka isase badhakar aur koee upaay hee nahin
jab dayaanaath paraast ho jaate the to akhabaar padhane lagate the
apanee haar ko chhipaane ka unake paas yahee sanket tha
